attributes.action: to a larger extent make St. George's day a more recognisable day for English people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: St George is the patron saint of England and therefore people should at least regocnise that the 23rd of April is the day it is celbrated.  In comparison to St. Patricks day very little is done to celebrate this day

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
